title: Successful Viewer Signup and Login
description: Verify that a user can sign up as a Viewer, complete onboarding, and log in successfully with email verification.

steps.description: Navigate to signup page
Fill in Viewer role, valid email, and password
Submit signup form
Receive email verification link
Click verification link to activate account
Login with verified credentials
Successfully logged in and redirected to Viewer homepage

title: Producer Signup and Onboarding Flow
description: Verify that a Producer can sign up, select Producer role, complete onboarding with preferences, and access Producer Studio dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to signup page
Select Producer role, fill in valid details
Submit signup form and verify email
Complete onboarding preferences
Successfully redirected to Producer Studio dashboard

title: Failed Login with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify that login fails when incorrect username/email or password are entered.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter incorrect email or password
Click login button
Login fails and error message is displayed

title: Resumable Video Upload with Status Transitions
description: Verify the complete resumable video upload process by a Producer and the status transitions: draft -> pending -> published after admin approval.

steps.description: Login as Producer and navigate to upload wizard
Start video upload and simulate interruption
Resume upload and complete successfully
Submit video metadata and set status to 'pending'
Admin receives notification of pending video
Admin approves video
Video status changes to 'published' and visible on platform

title: Adaptive Bitrate Streaming Performance
description: Verify that the video player uses adaptive bitrate streaming and starts playback with buffer under 2 seconds, saving progress correctly.

steps.description: Play a published movie on the cinematic player
Playback starts within 2 seconds buffer time
Simulate network bandwidth change
Streaming adjusts bitrate adaptively without interruption
Pause playback and navigate away
Return to same movie
Playback resumes from last saved progress position

title: Advanced Movie Discovery with Filters and Real-Time Search
description: Verify that browsing and searching movies returns accurate filtered results by genre, year, popularity, and keywords in real time.

steps.description: Navigate to browse movies page
Apply filter by genre 'Drama'
Displays movies only in 'Drama' genre
Apply filter by year 2023
Results show only movies from 2023
Sort by popularity
Movies are sorted with highest popularity first
Input keyword in real-time search box
Results update instantly matching keyword

title: Social Movie Actions: Like, Watchlist, Share
description: Verify that viewers can like movies, add/remove movies to/from their watchlist, and share movie links correctly.

steps.description: Login as Viewer and open a movie page
Click like button
Movie like count increments and user like status updated
Add movie to watchlist
Movie appears in user's watchlist
Remove movie from watchlist
Movie removed from watchlist
Use share button to copy movie link
Shared link is correct and accessible

title: Producer Dashboard Analytics and Earnings Accuracy
description: Verify that Producer's dashboard correctly displays real-time analytics, earnings projections, and payout history.

steps.description: Login as Producer and go to dashboard
Dashboard shows accurate view counts and engagement analytics
Earnings projections reflect streaming and subscription revenue correctly
Navigate to payout history
Payout records are displayed with correct status and amounts

title: Subscription Payment Flow via Stripe
description: Verify that viewers can select various subscription tiers, complete payment via Stripe, and access tier-based features immediately.

steps.description: Login as Viewer and navigate to subscription page
Select subscription tier with specified device count and video quality
Proceed to Stripe payment checkout
Complete payment successfully
Subscription status updated and user gains access to tier features
Simulate Stripe webhook payment success event
System backend updates subscription records accordingly

title: Admin Panel Content Moderation and Permissions
description: Verify that admins can review submitted movies, approve or reject, moderate user accounts, and restricted APIs enforce proper permissions.

steps.description: Login as Admin and navigate to Admin Panel
Review pending movie submissions
Approve and reject movies
Status of movies updates accordingly
Manage user accounts: suspend/reactivate
User access reflects moderation actions
Attempt restricted actions with non-admin user
Access denied responses received

title: UI Style and Responsiveness Validation
description: Verify the UI components conform to the branded dark, cinematic style with consistent typography, color scheme, and are responsive across devices.

steps.description: Open homepage, browse, player, and dashboard pages on desktop
UI matches design specs with dark theme and cinematic styling
Resize viewport to tablet and mobile sizes
Layouts adapt responsively without visual defects
Animations from Framer Motion appear smooth and consistent

title: Security Enforcement for Data Access and API Authorization
description: Verify that row-level security and authorization middleware prevent unauthorized data access on APIs and database queries.

steps.description: Login as Viewer and attempt to access Producer-only data and APIs
Access is denied with proper error messages
Login as Producer and attempt to modify other Producers' content
Unauthorized modification rejected
Send API requests with invalid or missing tokens
API returns authentication errors

title: API Performance and Availability Under Load
description: Verify critical API endpoints respond within performance targets and maintain availability and resilience under simulated high traffic.

steps.description: Simulate concurrent requests to featured movies, authentication, and video streaming APIs
Response times are within set performance thresholds
Simulate transient failures and verify automatic retries or graceful degradation
System maintains high availability without critical failures

title: Subscription Tier Upgrade and Cancellation Workflow
description: Verify viewers can upgrade subscription tiers and cancel active subscriptions with correct billing and access control updates.

steps.description: Login as Viewer with active subscription
Navigate to subscription management and select upgrade option
Complete payment for upgraded tier
User access level upgraded accordingly
Cancel subscription from management page
Subscription status updates and user loses premium access after period ends
